ComicInfo.Title: Persephone; Fuller Bush Person; The Secret; Touch Much Spa; Courting; Is Nothing Sacred?; Fanny Sparks; Mr. Right!; Hymn to the Hemorrhage; Hyman Glick; Love is...
ComicInfo.Summary:
Persephone: Persephone the cat is depressed and then suspects she's experiencing menopause.
Fuller Bush Person: Using her clitmobile, Mary visits several clients at their homes supplying them with sex products including vibrators and contraception.
The Secret: The unnamed lead character goes out at night for two weeks after supper to have her period.
Touch Much Spa: A visit to an X-rated summer spa.
Courting: Parallel dialogue between a harmonious couple's first date, their coitus and then afterwards.
Is Nothing Sacred?: Janice goes to the movie theater and leaves her son alone in her apartment with his girlfriend.
Fanny Sparks: Fanny, vowing never to go back to her dull office job, turns to high-level prostitution to improve her lot in life.
Mr. Right!: A cross-dressing couple undress and reveal their true sex.
Hymn to the Hemorrhage: A woman playing softball goes to the rest room to clean her shorts because her period has soiled them.
Hyman Glick: Ninety-Year-Old Hyman wants more than the masseuse can offer so Eddie offers to get him a sex therapist.
Love is...: An eight-panel homage/riposte to Kim Casali's Love Is... cartoon.
